docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 13-- The forthcoming conference of American foreign ministers is expected to adopt a compromise formula that will exclude immediate sanctions against Cuba but indict her politically and set up a mechanism for subsequent punitive...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 13-- The forthcoming conference of American foreign ministers is expected to adopt a compromise formula that will exclude immediate sanctions against Cuba but indict her politically and set up a mechanism for subsequent punitive action.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 15 --The United States has proposed that next week's conference of American foreign ministers order automatic sanctions against Cuba if she does not break her ties with the Communist powers within sixty days.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 15 --The United States has proposed that next week's conference of American foreign ministers order automatic sanctions against Cuba if she does not break her ties with the Communist powers within sixty days.
docs.abstract: US State Dept circulates 'working paper' urging Inter-Amer Foreign Mins Conf vote diplomatic sanctions against Castro Cuba unless it cuts ties to communism; US needs 14 votes at conf; is sure of 13; Kennedy sees hopes for consensus against Cuba, news conf; speculation
